comment: He is AMAZING! He is funny, nice, and lets everyone give their opinions. You need to read  the assignments in order to understand the lecture. He is very laid back and HILARIOUS! But understand this is a philosophy class! Religion is questioned if you can't handle it then don't take the class and ruin it for the rest of us. If you can TAKE HIM!!!!!

I have taken two of his classes now and wish I could take more. They are so interesting and make you want to go to class every day. As long as you read the articles that we discuss in class over topics like abortion, torture, and life and death, you will do well in the class. TAKE IT!

I took the Ways of Knowing course and really enjoyed it. This professor really makes his students feel at home and comfortable contributing to class discussion.  He does a great job of treating his students as equals.

This guy's really laid back and gets distracted a lot. This is an easy class if you are an intellectual person. 3 thought papers, 1st guarenteed A. Midterm/final a little tricky but he's just trying to make sure students read as opposed to listening in class (I got an A on both, and one of them I read all semester, the other I just paid attention)

This isn't an incredibly easy class, the grades are 30% for 3 outside papers and 30% each for final and midterm both are short answer/essay over 4 questions. But this teacher is amazing, you come out of it with a new outlook(so long as you have an openmind) which is what a college class should do. Funny guy, open to your opinion too.

I hated this class Most of the things we were supposed to read were hard to understand and try to say God doesnt exist He attempts to explain the readings in class but you have to have read. 3 thought papers:1st one gives everyone an A then after that he grades hard. Only two tests, the midterm and the final. Most of my class got F's on the midterm

He is extremely helpful and willing to listen as well as very funny.  The class is a blast! I highly recommend doing the readings; he will go over them, but the tests and papers are based on your understanding and interpretation. Conclusion: Wendel is very encouraging and makes it clear that his goal is to make you think.

he was such a fun teacher. i looked forward to going to his class everyday! just write down what he goes over in class and you'll do great! i never read any of the readings, just went to class and made an A!

Very nice and understand prof. does not take role, but will get a participation grade I missed about 11 days all together but still got a b in participation. two exam all essay if you read all the material exam will be easy. I didn't read much of it and still got a b in the class. He talks about each reading the next class and explains what was mea
Very clear, very helpful, and he makes the class very fun and interesting.
